channel.title: CVE Feed for Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Email
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Email

item.title: CVE-2023-42553|2024-08-02T19:23:39.826Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20email
item.description: Improper authorization verification vulnerability in Samsung Email prior to version 6.1.90.4 allows attackers to read sandbox data of email.

item.title: CVE-2023-30729|2024-08-02T14:37:15.456Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20email
item.description: Improper Certificate Validation in Samsung Email prior to version 6.1.82.0 allows remote attacker to intercept the network traffic including sensitive information.

item.title: CVE-2024-20867|2024-06-04T17:40:13.677Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20email
item.description: Improper privilege management vulnerability in Samsung Email prior to version 6.1.91.14 allows local attackers to access sensitive information.

item.title: CVE-2024-20867|2024-08-01T22:06:37.167Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20email
item.description: Improper privilege management vulnerability in Samsung Email prior to version 6.1.91.14 allows local attackers to access sensitive information.
